Name: The Suzy Wong
Ingredients: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Fresh tasting orange with a hint of basil.
History: Discovered in 2005 at Suzy Wong, Amsterdam, The Netherlands.
